name: cityzen-server
description: This is a [Next.js](https://nextjs.org) project bootstrapped with [`create-next-app`](https://nextjs.org/docs/app/api-reference/cli/create-next-app).

scripts.lint: echo 'Server lint' && eslint --config eslint.config.mjs && echo 'Client lint' && cd client && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Server lint fix' && eslint --fix --config eslint.config.mjs && echo 'Client lint fix' && cd client && npm run lint:fix
scripts.prettier: echo 'Server Prettier' && prettier --config .prettierrc --write . && echo 'Client Prettier' && cd client && npm run prettier
scripts.update-deps: echo 'Server' && ncu -i --format group && echo 'Client' && ncu -i --format group && echo 'Global' && ncu -g

author: Nicholas Nolen
